name: Chemical
overview: A puzzle\logic game from Jan Zimmermann and published in the 64'er 1993/05 magazine. It featured level passwords to quickly start back where you left off last time. Your task is to assemble the atoms into molecules, in the way shows when you press the space key. Move the crosshairs over an atom press the fire button to select and then use the joystick to push in the direction you want the atom to move. Time and level bonuses are applied so get crackin'!
